word: H5229 - נְכֹחָה - nᵉkôchâh - nek-o-khaw' - Equity - நீதி

sections.paragraph: நேர்மை, தெளிவு, செம்மையான, நீதியுள்ள, யதார்த்தமான - பெயரடை
straight in front, be in front of, straight, right, straightness, true things (of prophecy), rectitude (substantive)
Part(s) of speech: Adjective Feminine / பெயரடை (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Feminine of H5228; properly straight forwardness, that is, (figuratively) integrity, or (concretely) a truth: - equity, right (thing), uprightness.
Cognate: H5226, H5227, H5228, H5229
